Use {KEY:RotateLeft} and {KEY:RotateRight} to rotate left and right.
Use {KEY:RotateUp} and {KEY:RotateDown} to rotate up and down.
Use {KEY:RotateRollLeft} and {KEY:RotateRollRight} to roll left and right.
Placement is only allowed on {THING:StructureFrameIron} and {THING:StructureFrame} structures directly. If these are upgraded, they will offer better placement options.

Placement is snapped to the grid.

So you're stuck on the moon, but it's not all bad. Sure, it's cold, harsh and pretty monotonous, but at least the sun's shining. The solar panel is going to be useful, and the power controller... and probably the arc furnace too. There's even a little food and oxygen in the other crates, though it's definitely not going to last forever. Neither's your battery. You better start thinking about how you're going to survive. How hard could it be to rig up an airlock? A generator? Maybe even smelt some ore and build yourself a base? Looks like you're gonna be here a while.

This is Stationeers Creative Mode! Spawn in any item, test ideas and build bonkers stuff real fast. <color=red>This mode is experimental.</color> Think of it as a freeform space party where exciting and unexpected things* can and will happen, compared to the more reliable near-death experience of Survival Mode. Just don't be sad when you blow yourself into tiny, tiny little pieces or get savaged by chickens or slowly explode while drifting alone into the infinite void. *bugs
